docs.text: How to Query Datomic The goal of the book is to provide examples on how to use Datomic APIs effectivelly. We will not discuss Datomic Internals, how to model, and etc. This book is solely focused on ways to query Data. For any other questions I highly recommend Datomic Docs . We are going to create a data model and stick to it, try to be faimiliar with it as much as possible. Chapters d/q and d/query Index Pull and Index Range Datoms API
docs.title: Home
